arts.ttl: Højlund double seals comeback win for Manchester United over Viktoria Plzen
arts.sum: Rasmus Højlund’s double secured Manchester United a much-needed 2-1 comeback victory in the Europa League at Viktoria Plzen as Ruben Amorim registered his first away win as head coach. After making a promising start to life as Erik ten Hag’s successor, things were thrown off track as the shock exit of sporting director Dan Ashworth compounded back-to-back defeats to Arsenal and Nottingham Forest. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Luke Littler pleads for former Man United star to return to the club in now-deleted Instagram post after Red Devils man's error in Europa League win over Viktoria Plzen
arts.sum: United left it late in their Europa League clash on Thursday night, but a Rasmus Hojlund double salvaged a point for the side as they picked up their first European away win since March last year.

arts.ttl: Man United team-mates Rasmus Hojlund and Amad Diallo involved in furious on-pitch row after win over Viktoria Plzen - but Ruben Amorim insists 'it's a healthy thing'
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim was delighted by Rasmus Hojlund and Amad Diallo 's post-match bust-up in the Czech Republic as Manchester United 's head coach saw the fire he wants from his players.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim reveals reaction to Rasmus Hojlund and Amad's bust-up after Viktoria Plzen win
arts.sum: Rasmus Hojlund and Amad Diallo were involved in a heated exchange following Manchester United's late win at Viktoria Plzen, after both refused to pass to each other during two counter-attacks in added time

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim responds to Rasmus Hojlund & Amad Diallo arguing after Viktoria Plzen clash
arts.sum: Manchester United head coach Ruben Amorim insisted it was a "very, very good sign" to see Rasmus Hojlund and Amad Diallo visibly arguing after Thursday night's win over Viktoria Plzen as frustrations between the two boiled over in the closing stages.

arts.ttl: Rasmus Hojlund reveals how Anthony Martial helped inspire Manchester United's winning goal to down Viktoria Plzen in the Europa League
arts.sum: His first was a tap-in after some clever work from Amad Diallo but his second came via a cleverly disguised pass from Bruno Fernandes at a free-kick that caught Plzen's players off guard.

arts.ttl: Man Utd's win at Viktoria Plzen fails to mask dismal display that will concern Ruben Amorim
arts.sum: VIKTORIA PLZEN 1-2 MANCHESTER UNITED: While boss Ruben Amorim will have been delighted with the spirit his players showed in coming from behind to seal a vital win, there was much to concern him about the display

arts.ttl: Man United head coach Ruben Amorim matches Sir Matt Busby, Sir Alex Ferguson with win over Viktoria Plzen
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim becomes just the third Manchester United manager in history to win his first two matches in a major European competition in charge of the club.

arts.ttl: Viktoria Plzen 1-2 Man Utd: Match report and talking points as Red Devils make it three Europa League wins in a row
arts.sum: Discussing the key talking points as Man Utd came from behind to beat Viktoria Plzen in the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Man United players have 'huge belief' in Andre Onana despite his latest blunder, claims Bruno Fernandes... after he backed up Nottingham Forest howler by gifting Viktoria Plzen a goal
arts.sum: This time, away to Viktoria Plzen, Man United No 1 Andre Onana completely miscalculated a pass out from the back to Matthjis de Ligt, allowing the Czech side to nip in and tap into an empty net.
